Description.Text: Hotel Alma is a contemporary 3-star property offering modern accommodation in northwest Calgary. Highlights include free Wi-Fi, a stylish bistro and complimentary access to the leisure facilities at the University of Calgary. Northwest Calgary boasts several shopping, dining and entertainment options as well as good transport links to the downtown area. Nearby places of interest include McMahon Stadium, the Olympic Oval and the University of Calgary. University LRT train station is located in the vicinity, providing fast and easy access to other popular Calgary destinations. The hotel occupies a modern mid-rise building. Guests receive complimentary access to the leisure facilities at the University of Calgary, including the fitness centre, climbing wall, squash and racquetball courts and indoor swimming pool. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the premises. Eurostyle rooms are decorated in a bright, modern style with fresh tones, patterned carpets and light wood furniture. Amenities include a 32-inch flat-screen TV, work desk, mini-fridge, microwave, coffee machine and en-suite bathroom. Bistro Alma offers seasonal dishes for lunch in a stylish setting with a glass bar, chic barstools and black crystal chandeliers. A buffet breakfast is provided every morning and there are plenty of dining opportunities in the vicinity. The hotel has a 24-hour reception. Chargeable parking is possible nearby.
